prompt: Film still, amber-lit party after death, fragmented mirror veiled in clicking glass beads, cadaverous resurrected figure clutching wrist to feel racing pulse, everybody blurred-aware and watching, hazy slow-motion dread and smoke, cinematic 35 mm.
Add flickering translucent hands, rice-paper-thin chest with visible ribs, warm lighter & crumpled papers poking from pocket; mirror shards reflect Harry scar intermittently across beaded veil.
Mirror bulges outward from your touch, spiraling cracks leaking pale after-death light while glass beads swing faster, casting Harry/not-Harry slices across the amber room.
